entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -19.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
